text: You have a right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.
Whenever there is a decline in righteousness and an increase in unrighteousness, I manifest myself.
translation: Yada yada hi dharmasya glanir bhavati bharata

text: Abandon all varieties of duties and simply surrender unto Me. I shall deliver you from all sinful reactions; do not fear.
translation: Sarva-dharman parityajya mam ekam sharanam vraja
